title: New HUD
body:
Dear Riot
You have made checking ones cs, score, items, teammates hp, and almost every other aspect of the game much harder.
Thanks for that

"If it ain't broke, don't fix it"

KKieraNN

replies.body: im with u m8 this making me dizzy they need to put an option in so u can choose what u want the old or the new , this new one is just crapola rito plzzzzzzzzzzzzz listen to us{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

This piece of shit HUD frustrates me so much in game lol. Riot: "If it ain't broke, break it."

Atleast give us the option to move it around.
